comments.common_k: Shared retrieval k across all baselines for fair comparison
comments.selfrag_allow_oracle_context: Set to false for retrieval-only comparison, true for oracle-context regime
comments.graphrag_max_hops: Maximum hops for BFS-based subgraph expansion
comments.ketrag_skeleton_ratio: Ratio of top chunks to use for skeleton KG construction (0.3 = 30%)
comments.ketrag_max_skeleton_triples: Maximum KG triples from skeleton for answer generation
comments.ketrag_max_keyword_chunks: Maximum chunks from keyword-chunk bipartite graph
